patterns: how long does coffee take to make?
what is the time frame to prepare coffee drink?
responses:
Coffee generally takes between three and five minutes to brew, depending on the machine 
 and the type of coffee being brewed. For espresso or French press coffee, 
 it may take longer due to the increased contact time with water. Additionally, the amount 
 of coffee being brewed may also affect brewing time
